name: Slime Blasters
description:
**How to Play**

1) Desktop mode: Move your character using 'WASD' keys & shoot incoming slimes by clicking your mouse

2) Mobile mode: Movement is not available in mobile view. To remain stationary & shoot incoming slimes by tapping your screen.

3) Avoid being hit by the enemy slimes

The game ends when you lose all 3 lives. To play again, click the 'Play again' button on the Game Over screen.

Game created using Scratch programming language & open source free art & music assets.
